process.description: Step 1: Partition Dataset to Train/Validation Set

operator.name: Select Feature

process.description: STEP 2: Convert Features to Transactions/Items with Binary Occurences
STEP 3: Convert target attribute adn identifiers

STEP 1-3:
Preprocessing data for association rule mining

STEP 4:
Using FP-Growth, determine frequent item sets. A frequent item sets denotes that the items in the set have been purchased together or co-occur frequently, i.e. in a certain ratio of transactions. This ratio is given by the support of the item set.

STEP 5:
Create association rules which can be used as inclusion criteria for features engineered and selected depending on the confidences of the rules.
